subject: p15131736
History: Year old woman with intubated,sepsis, acute process.
Impression: In comparison to chest radiograph, cardiomegaly is accompanied by pulmonary vascular congestion and mild edema, with increasing small right and new small left pleural effusions. Worsening left retrocardiac opacification could reflect atelectasis or infectious consolidation.
